attributes.comment:
It's ridiculous to make people who are wanting to adopt children from other
countires pay more then they already have. They are already having to pay so
much to "purchase" a child and wait so long. If you are going to need to increse
the amount of money people have to put out to adopt, at least make it effective
after a certain date. Those that are already going through the process should not
have to pay the extra amount. If anything it should be new people just getting
started in the adoption process.(ex. if cut off date is Feb. 28,2007, anyone already
in the process before that date should NOT be affected by the increase, those
after the date will have to pay the higher amount.) It would be better for all those
wanting or needing to adopt to NOT increase the amount they have to pay to
adopt a child from another country. They just want to start or add to their family.
Does importance of family mean nothing to this country anymore? Why are
children having to be bought in the first place? It's not like merchandise that you
buy of a rack or shelf at a retail store. These are human beings. These children
that are being adopted from other countries are given a better life, if you make the
people who want to adopt spend all their money on the adoption process, you're
also taking away from that child. The adoptive parents may not be as finacially
stable if you keep making them pay more. Less people won't be able to adopt and
those suffering children in other countries will suffer even more. All of mankind
would hurt from your increase. A child is to be LOVED, not bought.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Elizabeth Wong
